fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Nove provides public affairs and strategic communication services to organisations willing to develop their presence at the heart of the European Union (EU) and/or establish a constructive dialogue with institutions and stakeholders contributing to the EU policy-making to maximise their business operations. Our clients include trade associations, companies and not-for profit organisations active in the fields of food & consumer goods, healthcare, ICT, environment, energy, trade and sport. More information, see: www.nove.eu
persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: BOEYNAEMS#Francis, Barbagallo#Valentina, DO NASCIMENTO COSTA#Frederico, Delibasic#Ivan, FEATHERSTONE#Stacey, Grandjouan#Thomas, Hennekinne#Raphaëlle, Kirk#Hugh, Macura#Jelena, Mc Keon #Barry , Miquel Vives#Bernat, NICOLETTI#Paolo, O'NEILL#George, Sigere#Samuel, VAN RAEMDONCK#Marie
goals__remit:
Nove is an advisory agency in public affairs and communication. 
 
Our team includes senior professionals with extensive experience in Brussels and a group of talented consultants with solid sector-specific expertise. We work as an extension of our clients’ team and use our public affairs expertise to support their operations.
customers: Applied Materials# Barilla Center for Food and Nutrition# Internet Society# Merck KgaA# Specialty Equipment Market Association# Internet Society# Equinor# Cemex# SES# Iberdrola# Heineken# Ericsson# Exxon# Ligue de Football Professionnel# Prysmian SpA# Sonae# Barilla sPa# ENI# European Sugar Refineries Association# Japan Business Council in Europe# Vodafone# Association Européenne des Audioprothésistes# SES# Associazione delle Industrie del Dolce e della Pasta italiane# Tate & Lyle# Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company# Amplifon# Société BIC
